button.supertip: Convert the numeric values in the selected range to six digit EmpIDs stored as text.
button.label: EmpID to Text

button.supertip: Convert the numeric values in the selected range to nine digit SSNs stored as text.
button.label: SSN to Text

button.supertip: Format a PeopleSoft query by removing the top line and inserting a named table.
button.label: Format Query

button.supertip: Convert all formulas in the given selection to the corresponding values.
button.label: Formulas to Values

button.supertip: This will autosize all columns in the active workbook with a max width of 35.
button.label: Autofit Columns

button.supertip: Create an array from the selection that can be used as an list member in a PeopleSoft query. This function will only include unique values. TIP: Selecting only the first EmpID in a list will automatically add the first 28 EmpIDs to your list criteria.
button.label: PS List Criteria

button.supertip: Take the selected cells and create a DECODE SQL statement.
button.label: Create SQL Decoder

button.supertip: Paste the copied cells into the selected area and remove the duplicated.
button.label: Paste/Remove
Gold's Gym Summary
button.supertip: Summarize the Gold's Gym Report from process PAY001 to prepare for the Gold's Gym representative.

button.label: Format ALP Report
button.supertip: Format the ALP report to show only a single line for each employee.

button.label: Online Check Report (TRC)
button.supertip: Format the Online Check Report with check number and name on each line. This will preserve the earnings codes and hours for each check.
